I have applied the last of the approved JIRAs! I wanted to have other review this last one however, especially @Bret H and probably @Bob Dolin

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-medication-assessed.html (new extension)

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-therapeutic-implication.html (see the additional guidance under Figure 1).

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-therapeutic-implication-definitions.html#Observation.extension:medication-assessed (review the details of using the extension)

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-therapeutic-implication-definitions.html#Observation.component:medication-assessed (review the changes to the component)
@Kevin Power I'll comment by end of day tomorrow

In http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-therapeutic-implication.html

image.png

There's a typo I think. Should it be specific not specifics? Also, the word is highlighted is it supposed to be a link?

Also suggest altering:
It is important to note that the therapy-assessed component is not intended for medications. This component should be used to deliver non-medication therapy whose implication on the outcome is being predicted (e.g. altered diet, radiation therapy, surgery, etc.)

TO: It is important to note that the therapy-assessed component is not intended for medications. This component should be used for non-medication therapy/ies which is/are the subject of the implication prediction (e.g. altered diet, radiation therapy, surgery, etc.)
No comments on the rest. (I'm done)
Thanks @Bret H !
@Kevin Power This looks great. Thanks! Do we have or should we have another Jira, to update the Figures?

I am about to push up changes to address @Bret H 's findings. For the figures, I think we can consider syncing up the figures with the changes as part of QA (meaning we don't need an additional JIRA).
Do we have lucid chart versions of the figures?
Nope :frown: -- but we need them.
Hmm...I think I could take the figs for groupers as a starting place and create them (to keep the look consistent). Want me to update the figures on Theraputic Implication?
That would be FANTASTIC @Bret H :smile:
on it.

@Bret H @Bob Dolin - I pushed some changes, do you all mind re-reading the section about medication and therapy assessed details under the first figure?
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-therapeutic-implication.html
@Kevin Power Looks good to me
is there more than figure 1 (http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/StructureDefinition-therapeutic-implication.html#pharmacogenomic-specific-genomic-implications) that should be changed?
I'm working on figure 1 only then if there are no other figures.
I will try to do a review and look for others but welcome anyone to review during the QA period to identify other images that need to change

I will be modifying: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/somatics.html figure 1 as well (similar modifications). Also, I will update the text to match the figure. I can do a branch or @Kevin Power let me know when to coordinate adding my changes.
it's pretty minor, except we'll have lucid chart images backing up the figs for future maintenance.
@Bret H - feel free to create your own branch anytime. Or if you feel lucky just apply the change directly to master :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:

So, what name is the Recommendation going by? Medication Usage Task or Medication Recommendation? The profile is Medication Recommendation but it's being referred to as either one in the text, in multiple pages ( incl Emerge example)
If you can point out the specific locations where the text is out of sync, feel free to log a technical correction JIRA and we can get it synced up.
Ok. but which name is right? Medication Recommendation, correct? it is the name of the profile. To be clear, we want to use that name.
